papers.title: Turnover of developers in libre software projects
papers.authors: Robles, G., González-Barahona, J. M., et al.
papers.relevance: Empirically analyzes developer turnover in OSS projects and its impact on project sustainability, showing how turnover affects core developer retention

semantic_scholar_match.title: Contributor Turnover in Libre Software Projects
semantic_scholar_match.venue: International Conference on Open Source Systems

citations.reasoning: These papers provide empirical evidence of how developer turnover directly impacts the core developer population in OSS projects, affecting project continuity and knowledge retention.
